name: Swag Grab
description:
Controls

  • Move with the arrow keys (pc) or d-pad (controller)
  • Jump with W (pc) or A (controller)
  • Pick up objects using E (pc) or X (controller)
    • Objects require effort to pick up
  • You can only hold 6 weight
    • Large swag weighs 3 and small weighs 1
    • More you carry and the harder it will be to do things
  • Over weight and you may need to drop your last swag
    • You will only drop the last item held
    • To do this press R (pc) or Y (controller)
